snippet: Dianna Duran made her first public appearance since the charges were leveled more than two weeks ago.
abstract: New Mexico Sec of State Dianna Duran pleads not guilty for fraud, embezzlement and other charges following accusations that she siphoned campaign contributions into her personal accounts.
lead_paragraph: Dianna Duran made her first public appearance since the charges were leveled more than two weeks ago.

headline.main: New Mexico: Secretary of State Pleads Not Guilty to Several Charges
headline.print_headline: New Mexico: Secretary of State Pleads Not Guilty to Several Charges
